title: Chinese Lunar Calendar
summary: Chinese Lunar Calendar shows both lunar and solar calendar.
developerAddress: 台北市信義區松德路18號10樓
description: Chinese Lunar Calendar Features:1,Exchange Solar Calendar and Lunar Calendar;2,Record the important days and dates;3,Check the weather report of your city;4,Divine your fortune and future.
descriptionHTML:
Chinese Lunar Calendar Features:
1,Exchange Solar Calendar and Lunar Calendar;
2,Record the important days and dates;
3,Check the weather report of your city;
4,Divine your fortune and future.
comments: i like that you can put the calendar on notification bar but why are the dates wrong???? i was so confused to see 农历新年 was YESYERDAY.
Language keeps changing to English by itself. Can something be done to stop this? It's pretty annoying.
好, 但在我的 Galaxy S8 文字常常轉回英文雖然己SET 了繁體中文。S8+ 用Android 7.0。
Part of the language still remain chinese even it has been changed to English.
Last update change better to / avoid from english to chinese.. How can i fix this? Thanks
No more English wordings on the better to and avoid. Please help!
recentChanges: 1, [Focus on repair] Fix the mistake of daily fortune  display;
